sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BAL_AGENTCHECK_INFO ( AGT_PHONE_NO , AGT_CONTRACT_NO , CHECK_TYPE , LOGIN_NO , OP_TIME) VALUES(#AGT_PHONE_NO# , #AGT_CONTRACT_NO# , #CHECK_TYPE# , #LOGIN_NO# , SYSDATE)
sqlMap.select: select count(1) CNT from bal_agentcheck_info where agt_phone_no = #PHONE_NO# and agt_contract_no = #CONTRACT_NO#
